general: This law allows the British Library Board to take out loans, like you or I might do when buying a house or car. The purpose of this act is to give the library board more financial flexibility so they can continue to improve their services and collections for the public.

series.short: "British Library Board Gains Unrestricted Borrowing Power with New Act"
series.text:
* Simplified point 1: The Power to Borrow clause in the British Library Board's incidental powers has been removed. This means that the board can now borrow money without any restrictions.
* Simplified point 2: The act applies to England, Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
* Simplified point 3: The act comes into effect after two months of its passing.
* Simplified point 4: The act can be referred to as the British Library Board (Power to Borrow) Act 2021.

summary: The British Library Board (Power to Borrow) Act 2021 allows the British Library Board to borrow money without any restrictions. This new law applies to all parts of the United Kingdom - England, Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland. It will come into effect two months after it was passed. So, the library board can now borrow money more easily to improve their services or do other important things. They can use this new power to get the funds they need quickly and easily.
single:
